description: Numbers n such that phi(n) * sigma(n) + 9 is a perfect square.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..210
Richard K. Guy, Divisors and desires, Amer. Math. Monthly, 104 (1997), 359-360.
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..6000] | IsSquare(EulerPhi(n) * SumOfDivisors(n) + 9)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 14 2014
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
